title: Your Shop Full Price Bug - PLEASE FIX THIS
body: So, as one of my discounts in the "your shop" deal that was introduced in 6.11, I was offered Mistletoe Leblanc at a 70% off rate (292 RP or something), and I bought it, but it charged me around 750 RP instead! Please fix this right now, nobody wants to spend more RP than is stated! (And if I could get my RP back too that would be nice.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! Was this a visual bug with your RP, or was your account charged full price? 

If you were charged full price, please shoot us a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into your account and make any adjustments. :)

Just a visual bug! I found out that I wasn't visually charged for a purchase earlier, so it appeared that I was charged more than the price of the skin, but it was really just 2 purchases worth of RP being charged visually, sorry.
Phew! No worries at all - would rather have it reported to be safe. ^-^
